info.title: Application Content Builder
info.description: Builds an application content with a specified container's id and class. It loads application view's html and can parse application's literals.

prop.name: appID
prop.description: The application's id that loads this object.

parameter.name: $appID
parameter.description: The application's id for this content (if any). It is empty by default.

method.name: build
method.description: Build the outer html content container.

parameter.name: $id
parameter.description: The element's id. Empty by default.

parameter.name: $class
parameter.description: The element's class. Empty by default.

parameter.name: $loadHTML
parameter.description: Indicator whether to load html from the designer file.

method.name: getActionFactory
method.description: Creates a new Application Action Factory instance.
method.returndescription: An instance of the Application Action Factory object.

method.name: getAppContainer
method.description: Builds an async application view container and returns the DOMElement.

parameter.name: $appID
parameter.description: The application ID to load async.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The application's view name to load.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: A set of attributes to be passed to the module with GET method during loading. It is an array (attrName => attrValue)

parameter.name: $startup
parameter.description: Sets the module to load at startup (next content.modified).

parameter.name: $containerID
parameter.description: The id attribute of the container DOM Object.

parameter.name: $preload
parameter.description: Set the container to preload the content synchronously.

method.name: getAppViewContainer
method.description:
Builds an async application view container and returns the DOMElement.
It will load a view of the current running application.

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The application's view name to load.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: A set of attributes to be passed to the module with GET method during loading. It is an array (attrName =&gt; attrValue)

parameter.name: $startup
parameter.description: Sets the module to load at startup (next content.modified).

parameter.name: $containerID
parameter.description: The id attribute of the container DOM Object.

parameter.name: $preload
parameter.description: Set the container to preload the content synchronously.

method.name: getReport
method.description: Get the ServerReport of this HTML Application Cpontent or the object holder.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The content holder. If empty, it gets the default application content holder.

method.returndescription: The server report or the object holder.

method.name: loadLiterals
method.description: Loads application's literals in the designer's html file.

method.name: getParentFilename
method.description: Gets the parent's filename for loading the html from external file.
